DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effectiveness pain neurophysiology education neck/shoulder exercise intervention adolescent chronic idiopathic neck pain ( CINP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Neurophysiology Education Exercise Adolescents With Chronic Idiopathic Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Forty three adolescent chronic idiopathic neck pain randomly allocate receive pain neurophysiology education shoulder/neck exercise ( n=21 ) intervention ( n=22 ) . Data pain intensity ( Visual Analogue Scale ) , pain disability , neck flexor extensor muscle endurance , scapulae stabilizer endurance , pain catastrophizing ( Pain catastrophizing Scale ) , trait state anxiety ( State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ) knowledge pain neurophysiology ( Neurophysiology Pain Questionnaire ) collect . Measurements take intervention . Statistical analysis perform use mixed-methods ANOVA .
DOC.criteria: To invite enter study participant chronic idiopathic neck/shoulder pain , define pain felt neck/shoulder region least week previous 3 month . No exclusion criterion
